import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { Carousel, Button, Card } from 'flowbite-react'; import reading from '../../assets/reading.svg' import '../analytics/analytics.css'; import geo from '../../assets/geography.jpeg' import individual from '../../assets/individual.svg' import teacher from '../../assets/teacher.svg' import student from '../../assets/student.svg' const SectionThree = () => { return (

Learn and Teach with EduBahamas

Register as a Teacher

Create classrooms and monitor each student's progress.

Register as a Student

Test your knowledge with quizzes and create study groups.

Register as an Individual

Learn at your own pace, with individualized progress tracking!

) } export default SectionThree
